AI Description: SageMath is an open-source mathematical software system that integrates the power of many existing open-source packages into a common Python-based interface. It provides modern tools for algebra, number theory, calculus, symbolic and numerical mathematics, data analysis, and visualization.
Core Features: Wide Range Of Mathematics Functionalities, Python-Based Interface, Integration Of Multiple Open-Source Packages, Symbolic & Numerical Computation Capabilities, Data Analysis & Visualization Tools
